summary: This mod is my second follower mod and adds again 5 new followers to the game.
descriptionHtml:
It adds 5 new followers to the game, each with his own skills and specialities. 
The last one is special like the 5. in my first mod. 

Now to your five new followers: 



1. K'zen: 

-Race: Khajit 

-Job: Assassin 

-Skills: One-Handed 

-Location: Dawnstar Sanctuary 



2.Shidra: 

-Race: Redguard 

-Job: Mercenary 

-Skills: One-Handed (dual-wielding 2 Swords) 

-Location: Rorickstead, Frostfruit Inn 



3.Hornar: 

-Race: Nord 

-Job: Former Greybeard 

-Skills: Destruction, Shouts! 

-Location: High Hrothgar 



4.Onoras: 

-Race: High Elve 

-Job: Former Thalmor 

-Skills: One-Handed, Destruction 

-Location: Whiterun, Bannered Mare 



DON'T read any further and just skip the next paragraph if you want to be surprised by the last follower and haven't done the Winterhold College's questline (and get spoilers of it). If you have done it it's no problem.




5. Savos Aren (Ghost):

-Race: Dark Elve (of course)

-Job: Former Archmage

-Skills: Destruction

-Location: Labyrinthion (where you meet his ghost the last time)





And again if you like the Steam Workshop more here is the link:
[url=http://]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=263239727[/url]

Also check out my other mod.
author: Kishin aka kindskopp
